text: Mauro Barni was an Italian physician, professor and politician. Professor Barni was rector of the University of Siena from 1970 to 1979. He served as Mayor of Siena from 1979 to 1983. ==References== ==Bibliography== * Category:1927 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Mayors of Siena Category:Italian Socialist Party politicians Category:University of Siena faculty
title: Mauro Barni
